short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NestFinancer helps you calculate how much house you can afford. Make informed decisions with personalized recommendations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏠 NestFinancer

👀 Quickly see houses you can really afford directly on Zillow, Redfin, and Realtor websites.
📊 NestFinancer crunches your financial data to give you your purchase power and debt-to-income ratio.
💅 Unclutter Zillow listings (Redfin and Realtor coming soon), and shows you houses you can really afford.
🚫 Removes Zillow ads within listings

Overview
Adjust your financial settings to quickly get a glance of what you can afford, by turning the price in RED whenever a house might compromise your purchasing power, and green when you're in the right debt-to-incomre ratio.

NestFinancer allows you to effortlessly assess your purchasing power based on your annual income and other financial factors. Simply input your financial details, and let NestFinancer do the rest and crunch the numbers. As you explore property listings, NestFinancer provides real-time visual indicators, helping you identify homes within your budget at a glance.

💰 Gain instant insights into your purchasing power, enabling informed decision-making while browsing property listings.

💰 Streamline your search by effortlessly identifying homes that align with your budget and financial goals.

💰 Take control of your home buying journey with personalized affordability assessments tailored to your financial situation.

Install NestFinancer today and embark on your journey towards homeownership with clarity and confidence!
